thread.title: Michael --
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Michael --

author: Michael --
title: Michael --
text:
I called Optima after doing research online, Really not sure who to trust.. I saw the were part of the better business bureau and gave it a shot. I really have zero complaints. Jennifer B. Was my contact and she always answered my calls or kept me in the loop on everything. It was tedious at times on my end to get them the documents they needed but they really know what there doing. I was stressed beyond belief after falling behind on years of taxes and was more or less lost on what to do. It was all resolved at a fraction of what I owed and I would recommend them to anyone who was I. The same position I put myself in.
Thanks Mike
